statements: UPDATE conflicts_of_interest SET researcher_name = 'John Doe', department = 'Engineering', date_reported = '2022-03-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE conflicts_of_interest SET research_topic = 'Artificial Intelligence', conflict_description = 'Potential conflict related to funding', date_reported = '2022-04-20' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE conflicts_of_interest SET researcher_name = 'John Doe', department = 'Research Department', date_reported = '2021-08-20' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE conflicts_of_interest SET research_topic = 'Biomedical Ethics', conflict_description = 'Confidential conflict details', date_reported = '2021-09-10' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE ethics_review_board SET researcher_name = 'John Doe' where id = 1;
UPDATE conflict_status SET status='Approved', review_date = '2022-10-31' where researcher_id = 3;
UPDATE ethics_review_board SET conflict_description = 'Conflicts of interest related to funding sources' WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice Smith'
UPDATE conflict_status SET review_date = '2022-09-15', status = 'Approved' WHERE researcher_id = 101
UPDATE conflicts_of_interest SET conflict_description = 'Updated conflict description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE researchers SET institution = 'Updated institution name' WHERE researcher_id = 2;
UPDATE conflicts_of_interest SET conflict_description = 'Updated conflict description' WHERE researcher_name = 'Alice' AND research_project = 'Project A';
UPDATE researchers SET institution = 'New Institution', email = 'new_email@domain.com' WHERE researcher_id = 100;
UPDATE conflicts_of_interest SET conflict_description = 'Updated conflict description' WHERE employee_id = 1;
UPDATE conflict_reviews SET review_result = 'Approved', review_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE review_id = 3;
UPDATE conflicts_of_interest SET research_topic = 'Machine Learning', conflict_description = 'Research topic updated to Machine Learning' WHERE employee_id = 12345;
UPDATE conflict_reviews SET review_result = 'Approved', review_date = '2022-08-15 09:30:00' WHERE review_id = 9876;
UPDATE ethics_review_board SET conflict_type = 'Financial' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE conflicts SET date_added = '2022-01-15', conflict_description = 'Intellectual property conflict' WHERE id = 3
UPDATE ethics_review_board SET conflict_type = 'Financial', date_reported = '2022-05-15' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE institutions SET location = 'New York' WHERE id = 3
